title: The Indelible Alison Bechdel: Confessions, Comix, and Miscellaneous Dykes to Watch Out For
description: Go behind the pen and into the psyche of "dyke to watch out for" Alison Bechdel, cartoon chronicler extraordinaire, as the inner workings of lesbiana's most quick-witted, longest-running social commentator are revealed. Illustrations throughout .
author: Alison Bechdel
